name: Stage 3 digital prototype
description:
Install instructions

Instructions: 

  1. download & unzip folder
  2. Run Stage 3.exe
  3. Hunt “animals”(basic shapes) to evolve your monster
  4. “Eat them” (run into them)
  5. Animals will respawn randomly around but near to you so hunt them again
  6. Each animal (shape) will change your monster

Controls:

  1. WASD/ arrow keys to move
  2. Mouse to look around
